title: Country diary: Badger v wasp, or, the aftermath of the carnage | Mark Cocker
summary: In Longstone Edge, Derbyshire, a disheveled wasps' nest was discovered, indicating a disturbance. Paw prints around the site suggest that an animal had interacted with the nest. This scene leaves much to the imagination regarding the chaos that ensued.

title: Australian Greens co-founder Drew Hutton takes party to court in bid to reinstate life membership
summary: Hutton has filed an affidavit in the Queensland Supreme Court to challenge their expulsion from the Greens party. The expulsion was related to a contentious debate on trans rights. The case highlights ongoing tensions within the party regarding these issues.
